description: Demolition of the existing buildings, erection of a warehouse, storage building, welfare building, weighbridge office, sprinkler pump and control room, sprinkler tanks, relocation of electrical substation and provision of new boundary treatments, access gates, parking spaces and cycle storage for use of the site as a waste transfer and recycling station.
